website_summaries.verdict: High quality construction in a dog seat belt and harness in one set to provide safety.
pros: Can use the harness separately for walking the dog on a leash if you want
Has a quick on-off system, so you can connect the dog to the restraint quickly
Chest plate is padded to keep the dog comfortable
cons: Harness fits especially tight, high on the chest and near the neck

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic closure doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars, but the magnetic closure would back out occasionally. This happened when we were at San Francisco's fisherman's wharf while crossing the street. My dog is extremely well trained and when given the "Down" command, he immediately sits which allowed me to slip the harness back on him. Any other dog though may have freaked out and run off which could be catastrophic for both the dog and the dog parents. This closure needs work!
customer_reviews.author: Noena808

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, stiff, not for medium/small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This was our first choice of a harness for our 35 lb dog. It was VERY bulky and stiff. This is not a good harness for a small or medium dog because the neck cuff is long and stiff and caused my dog to hold his neck in extension while wearing it. He looked so uncomfortable. The leg straps are like seat belts: they're wide and stiff and cut into his groin and armpits. This harness would be great on a large dog. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Dog can get lower jaw caught in shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.text: Properly adjusted (today 6/15/18) and fitted to my 2 years old Australian Shepherd and within 5 minutes of putting it on she got her lower jaw under the shoulder strap and chewed it in two. $100 destroyed in 5 minutes. Bought last December, first road trip set for tonight. I can’t afford $100 to replace it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: emptynester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safety harness. Very easy to put on a wiggly 50 pound bulldog. Ordered an XL size because he is still a pup and growing. Good heavy construction and the handles on top help a great deal when lifting in a car.
customer_reviews.author: JABH, St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: The design of this is best for a dog that does not want to lay down. When my dog laid down the rigidity of the harness choked him. There should be a "u" shaped cut out at the top of the harness under the dogs throat. This harness was returned and I was refunded.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Happy My Dog Is Secure
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after I had to hit the brakes and watched my dog slam into the dash- poor puppy. Now I can't believe I ever drove around with my buddy unsecured and at-risk. Easy to fit, easy and quick to use, and he's tolerated well. I keep treats in the glove box so he gets rewarded for getting strapped in. Bonus is that my car is a lot cleaner since he's secured to a covered seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fatchihuahua

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED- I wanted the best, spent a ton of money and now Im ...
customer_reviews.text: These do not work well on small dogs! The breast plate is very hard and my maltipoo came close to breaking a leg or dislocating a shoulder just moving around while being strapped in. I wrote the manufacturer that I needed my money back because they are not safe but it was past the designated return date so I got no response. VERY DISAPPOINTED- I wanted the best, spent a ton of money and now Im just out a loss of $200!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mersal

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy harness for my large dogs.
customer_reviews.text: A very well made harness - my dogs are big and they need really sturdy ones. Once you get them fitted, they slip on/off very easily and holds them comfortably. The magnetic closure really is nice - the two sides slide together easily and the magnet holds really strongly in place, yet releases easily when you slide them open..
customer_reviews.author: 8padfeet

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: This product is very difficult to size to the dog, very difficult to keep the vest locked together in the back. It has supposedly a magnetic clasp/clip; but, that comes apart way too easily. So what good is it if the whole thing just opens up while the dog is in it? I would not buy this product again; and unfortunately I can not send it back either because I did not have the chance to use it until now and now is approximately 4 months after the close of the return window. Sadly I spent $100.00 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L.

customer_reviews.title: Size guide can be misleading...
customer_reviews.text: Got he small because his girth is 19". The back straps are at the maximum size, and it won't fit if he grows any more. Size guide is not very good. If it wasn't $99 it wouldn't be too bad, but if I have to get the medium in a few months I will be really upset.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Latch is defective
customer_reviews.text: So much time and effort put into this harness, yet it failed not once, not twice, but 3 times! The materials look great BUT, The latch is cheap. The magnet is weak and did not consistently stay together. It needs a safety clasp on both sides, or a much stronger clasp/magnet. Twice I looked back to see that the harness had come apart on my 85 lb. German Shepherd. This also happened when I tried to use it during a walk as a leash harness. I will not compromise safety with a family member, even the 4 legged kind. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: George Sand

customer_reviews.title: Falls right off while on the road!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is absolutely worthless as the magnetic clip is a complete fail causing the harness to fall off if she moves at all! This was $115 for that price I shouldn’t have to use a carabiner to prevent the harness from falling off. We were driving and I looked back and it had fallen off of her!!!!!!!!! Update only had this for a few days now and it has failed completely we’re now returning this as this will not keep my dog safe due to the supposedly “magnetic locking clip” doesn’t lock at all it failed my dog every car ride!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lainy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: I have a four-month old Akita puppy and did a ton of research on the best car harness. After reading the already terrific reviews, I bought it. It arrived ahead of scheduled delivery and must say it was a breeze to adjust the straps and click her in the car. With my car, she does have the ability to either sit or lie down although this will obviously change as she becomes an adult. I did order the LARGE because it fit her perfectly and will adjust nicely as she gets bigger. Apparently, it is crashed-tested with high marks. She really enjoys the harness. Highly, highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK AS ADVERTIZED
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE (2) 85 POUND GERMAN SHEPHARDS. ON OUR TRIP TO FLORIDA FROM NEW JERSEY MY DOGS GOT OUT OF THIS HARNESS IN 5 MINUTES. THE MAGNETIC CLOSURE ON THE BACK OF THE HARNESS IS NOT SECURE ENOUGH TO KEEP THE VEST ON YOUR DOG DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND KEEP YOUR $100 NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: nick d.

customer_reviews.title: Easy lock equals a dead dog!
customer_reviews.text: Easy lock is easy fail. This is a horribly irresposinbly promoted product. I recommend this product a fail to ada. Horrible. I would not ethically recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Heid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent attention to Every detail
customer_reviews.text: Well made. These people care about your dog. Excellent attention to Every detail. He was a little hesitant at first about wearing it. After some treats and working with his ball he was soon okay with it. The Clasps are easy to use, taking it off is as simple as release both clamps and it falls to the ground and he steps out of the arm holes. Getting him into the arm holes takes some squirming and negotiation, but he will enjoy it once he associates wearing the harness with going for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Rowland Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to adjust!!
customer_reviews.text: Size Small fits my corgi perfectly (Pembroke Corgi 18.00 lbs). It took me approximately 10 minutes to readjust it and the instructions were very straightforward so I didn’t have any problems with that. Overall, I highly recommend getting one of these safety harness over the cheaper ones that aren’t tested. It’s pricy but worth it since I travel with my pup quite a bit and she’s like a family member to me. I’d do anything to make sure she’s as safe as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Do

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: We have a 20lb miniature Australia Shepherd and purchased the small. It is very sturdy and you can tell that in the event of an accident you furry best friend will be safe. We read several of the reviews and saw a lot of folks said the chest plate was too stiff. As some had suggested we “worked” the chest plate so it was not so ridged and seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Lpaulk

customer_reviews.title: EzyDog DRIVE Dog Car Harness is a High Quality Dog Seat-belt Harness.
customer_reviews.text: The EzyDog DRIVE Dog Car Harness works as described. It fits my dog, a Standard Poodle, perfectly. It was very easy to adjust the harness to fit just right. I like the fact that the EzyDog DRIVE Dog Car Harness has wide straps and is padded so as not to cut into the dog in the case of an accident. It's easy to get the EzyDog DRIVE Dog Car Harness on and off him too. The two attached "D" rings make it convenient to attach a lead for walking my dog without removing the harness. I am very happy with my purchase from EzyDog.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER B

customer_reviews.title: Don't look any further for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: This thing is exactly what I was looking for. Built really tough, designed extremely well with nice little features like a REALLY easy snap on-slid off locking system and a brilliant system of adjusting and then tucking away the straps. I saw someone way it wasn't good for small dogs... I can imagine that. But I have a large black lab and I can stop looking now, this is what I wanted and it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: scrapper

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY if you have an active dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our 1-year old Golden Retriever wriggled out of this even after multiple adjustments to tighten the harness. If we made it any tighter she wouldn't be able to breathe. She just shimmied and wiggled until she could slide out of it backwards. Then the return window closed on us while we were trying to make it work. So we WASTED $115 on this thing. Worst Amazon purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lumadue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small dog with a booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small for my 20 pound beagle mix and it works great. I use it in combo with his booster seat, which has two clips that latch onto this harness perfectly. He stays put well and I have had a few close calls with bad drivers. Definitely worth it and I am glad I purchased it because I haven't seen anything like it. I recommend getting a booster seat that you can attach with a seat belt and then latching this to the booster seat buckles. It works really well in that situation. I am not sure how well it would work without something else to latch to it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This harness was difficult to get adjusted while on my dog but it was worth the effort to get it right, It holds up well in sudden stops and keeps my dog from hanging his head out the window while I drive which is dangerous. The harness also has a walking attachment on the harness so you don't have to remove the harness when you want to go into the store, well worth the price very professionally made good craftsmanship Oh, the bottom plate is flexible so it fits comfortably on your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Oli733

customer_reviews.title: JVery sturdy, feels safe. She doesn’t walk very well in it though. Only use for driving
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of this harness. I feel my dog is very secure when in this harness connected to a seatbelt. It is definitely a quality product. The chest part is so hard and sturdy it stays straight, it doesn’t bend to contour to my dogs body. I would have given all 5 stars if my dog could also walk easily in this harness. It is so hard and sturdy that she walks funny in it, so I only leave it on her when driving. I never attach to a leash for her to walk, I use a different harness for walking. I bought a medium for my 43 lb poodle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic clasp came undone
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be the best thing ever, but the magnetic clasp came undone twice and my dog escaped. Not cool. Also, my dog is 85lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Khalahari Sonora

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but the doggies did not like it at all. Also, I could see that the dogs would turn sideways in a crash, and I was worried about that. Had to return it and find another way to secure them.
customer_reviews.author: MPB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product but when I got the medium it was too large and when I got the small it was too small. The difference between those two sizes was drastic! The small isn't just a moderate amount smaller, it's considerably smaller. My dog is 30 pounds and the small was very small on her and with the medium, the front chest plate was so wide that it dug into her legs. The quality and design are great, but there needs to be a size in between those two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet Safety
customer_reviews.text: The product is very secure and fits our 43lb. dog nicely. When adjusted properly (you need to work this part out with your pet ;) ) it fits very securely and will restrain your animal. We experienced severe auto accident, and thankfully pet was not involved in this incident. This made us realize pet needs to be secured too. We believe this product gives us the best protection for our pet and EVERYONE should buckle up for Safety's sake, even for the shortest car rides.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Xavier

customer_reviews.title: ... bag with the tags ripped off of it very disappointed that a manufacturer would send this to a customer ...
customer_reviews.text: This came from the manufacturer use loaded with dog hair and in a shopping bag with the tags ripped off of it very disappointed that a manufacturer would send this to a customer as a new item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: Took our German Shepherd on a road trip and he traveled in the cargo area of the SUV. I am extremely pleased with the harness, I purchased a zip line to attach him to so he could move around. He was great when I put the harness on him the first time and has never had a problem with it on. Quality is 1st class and totally worth the extra expense. I researched all my options for the dog for our trip and I am very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very good harness
customer_reviews.text: This Dog Harness would have received 5 stars across the board, it is that good. My review gave it 4 stars because it isn't as easy as some of the other harnesses I've used. With this harness you must put the dogs front two feet through it. The security features are great except for the fact that one of my German Shepard puppies was able to unlock his harness by bumping a wall. This is a very sturdy harness and took both of my German Shepard Pups on a five hour ride with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Takes some effort
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a worthy product. I had a had time adjusting the straps to fit my dog. I watched the video several times but just didn't get it. She's large and got out of the car harness twice. I know its because I didn't fit it to her properly.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Worked on a skinny 6 mos old Cavapoo so should work fine on bigger dogs as well....
customer_reviews.text: Cavapoo is about 14Lbs and was able to back out of this device until we cinched it down to the max. It is very stiff and difficutl to adjust but once we figured out how to do it the harness worked fine. The problem with attaching it to a typical back seat belt is that it puts a lot of tension on the dog and we had to add a rubber band to the belt so it wouldnt retract all the way, otherwise he was pinned down to the seat and kept doing sommersaults in the seat resulting in a twisted belt.
customer_reviews.author: faknws

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you care about your pet.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended if you care about your dog. Our beloved pet doesn't even notice this harness when we put him in the car. It is just part of the transition. The harness is very adjustable and extremely strong. The design intends to keep the pet from severe injury in the vent of a major car crash.
customer_reviews.author: R Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Want to like this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this harness based on the crash test qualities, but have to return the size medium because the front plate is a bit to large for my girl’s frame. I will consider purchasing the small, but apparently THE EZYDOG SEATBELT LEAD (the attachment you can use with other harnesses, is not for use with EzyDog DRIVE Crash Tested Harness. I feel I need to attach a piece so she is not attached directly to the seat belt. Can anyone confirm this?
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on amd latches with a magnitized slide lock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit size M dog weighs 47lbs. Easy to put on, take off and I bought the EASY BUCKLE STRAP but it works better without it. Love it. This is my third try, the other brands were too complicated, love this harness!
customer_reviews.author: Kdick

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but needs a different closure, didn’t work for big dog
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this but for my 100 lbs mastiff puppy, it just didn’t work. It fit him fine once I adjusted the straps and was relatively easy to get on (dog has to step into it), but the magnetic closure kept popping open whenever he moved around normally in the car. Harness was well made (I love EzyDog brand leashes), but the closure was a deal breaker since we couldn’t keep it on him. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clip stopped working, fell off my dog and got lost on day 3 of a 5 day road trip
customer_reviews.text: This worked great until the closure clip stopped latching and it fell off my dog while I was unloading the car and checking in to a hotel. It was lost (or picked up by someone while I wasn't looking) and it was gone. On day 3 of a 5 day cross country trip-I only used it for 3 days before the clip stopped working. The most expensive 3 days of a seat belt I have ever had. I was great while I had it. Really terrible once I didn't have it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kaamala Thorne

customer_reviews.title: ... have a 90 lb pit bull this harness is awesome! Never had a seat belt system for any ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 lb pit bull this harness is awesome ! Never had a seat belt system for any of my dogs till I had to stand on my brakes and I thought he was going to go threw the front windshield this fixed that problem easy to use easy fitment he wares a lg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to work out
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that when you and your dog get the hang of it, its a safe harness. However, everytime I tried to put it on my dog has been a battle. Even adjusting it to the seat belt has been an ordeal. The three times I used it on him (70 lb rescue) he was miserable, I was miserable and he ended up getting tangled in it. An expensive experiment.
customer_reviews.author: colette

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made an extra small
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would have been a great harness but unfortunately I needed an extra small for my malti-Pooh who is about 6 pounds. Unfortunately I had to return it, no problems though with the return
customer_reviews.author: Neefafeefa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car harness
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to get it sized perfectly for my dog, but the length markings on the straps made it a lot easier. The material seems very sturdy and has all high quality components. The one time fitting makes it super easy to get on and off once you have it fit to your dog. Haven’t had a chance to take my dog on a ride yet, but the quality of all the pieces makes me very confident throat it will keep my dog safe in the car. Will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs with short torso, it cuts their necks
customer_reviews.text: It has a large torso size . Not for small short dogs like Maltese, maltipoo, etc I started the return then tossed the package in the trash by mistake cleaning because I can’t find it. Oh well! I guess it was mean to happen that way. The company not to have a return and me to lose $120. 00 Great well made product by the way
customer_reviews.author: ELENA BREEDLOVE

customer_reviews.title: Boot a Good Fit for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: Harness looks very secure and well-made. I like the position of the seatbelt loops. Unfortunately, the chest plate is very stiff and too long for my dog. It hits her in the throat.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Harness
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for my 80 lbs Rotty, Black Lab, Border Collie mix. He hasn't protested yet! Well built piece of kit, easy to adjust and looks good ( My opinion ). Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gravitycheck

customer_reviews.title: This product keeps her very secure and actually seems to help calm her down.
customer_reviews.text: The product fits my 65 pound German Shepherd as expected. I ordered the medium and it could be let out for a much larger dog than she is. It does not rub her anywhere and she rides much quieter in the car than she did in her crate. My seatbelts are not quite long enough so I am going to add a short seatbelt extender to them.
customer_reviews.author: Maggieme

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - easy to fit and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought and returned so many of these car harnesses because they are a pain to fit and/or take off and on. This one is awesome. Took a bit of work to fit it but once that was done it’s done. I love how sturdy the harness is and the extra straps fold away perfectly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used the size chart and get a large. It fit my 55lb chocolate lab perfectly. She goes everywhere with me and this gives me peace of mind while we rip around in the Lamborghini that she’ll be safe if we’re even in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very bulky
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this harness because of the great reviews and safety features. However it is very bulky for my dog and was uncomfortable for him to wear in anything but a standing position. When he sat and especially laid down, the stiff front part did not stay in place and dug into his neck. Overall seems to be a very well made harness, just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The clasp on this harness comes undone. My dog almost jumped out the car window because I was not aware the clasp had come undone and my boy was completely out of his harness. The clasp slides to open and it obviously will slide without any prompting. If my boy had jumped out the window, he would probably be dead today !!!! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Patti Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave three stars to use the middle star as neutral. I ordered a large and got a small. After looking at the quality of the small, I didn't think it would work for my 80 lb lab. Returning it was a bit of a hassle as well. I have to use UPS pick up and if I miss that it will be another errand to run to drop off. One more thing, I wouldn't say the quality is bad, but definitely not worth $130 (after shipping price).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully built, strong as hell
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully built, strong as hell, and the dogs seem to like them well enough. The company was SUPER helpful in deciding the right size and answering all my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love your dog? Protect them!
customer_reviews.text: Once I had it adjusted to fit correctly, it’s very easy to put on and off my dog. It just took quite a bit of adjusting to get it right. I do not understand why anyone that loves their dog and takes them anywhere doesn’t use the best harness/seatbelt you can find. Lucy is comfortable and safe. I highly recommend this harness. Drive safe.
customer_reviews.author: M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I could not restraint my dog with the car seat belt and the harness by itself, he couldn't lay or sit properly maybe because of my dog's weight. The seat belt would pull the harness/him really tight to the back seat and then he would try get out of it because he couldn't move. Thankfully he never got out of the harness which was great, but when adding the EzyDog Dog Seat Belt Safety Lead he was more comfortable and still safe. Now he is using both everytime we take a ride and we both ended loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: Fer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra fur
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be worth the money, it is A LOT more sturdy than any other harness I’ve seen or used (two k9s @ 85lbs) The quick clip makes getting the pups in and out of it easy, and the once the fit is done the buckles are designed to really stay put, the whole product just seems very well thought out and I personally feel a little more peace of mind having my kids in something like this as opposed to a cheaper model with thin straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: It is well made but my dog didn't like it and it increased her anxiety . She prefered to ride in back
customer_reviews.author: Gmando61

customer_reviews.title: Chest plate too wide
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. Followed precise measurement directions. I have an Aussie. Unfortunately. The chest piece was to wide to fit between his legs. I got the harness on him but he could not walk. Returned unit. Tried to reach out to EasyDong to share feedback but they do not have a customer service number.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this harness. The magnetic clip on the back comes apart very easily . My airedale terrier got out of it several times during the rides even with the safety clasp on.
customer_reviews.author: Hanka Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog secure
customer_reviews.text: It works great in the backseat of our Subaru Forester. Our 50 pound mutt can no longer try to jump in to the front seat when I'm driving, and I know is safe if I have to brake quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harness is easy to use and it really keeps my dog secure
customer_reviews.text: Harness is easy to use and it really keeps my dog secure, I also appreciate keeping my dog from being mobile in the car, I wish I would’ve ordered one months ago I would have avoided a tear on the leather. Better late than never...I would highly suggest all you dog lovers out there invest in this
customer_reviews.author: zubair memon

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and other than mobility issues it's a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I just took a star off because it makes the dog lay down on the seat even with the extension. They can't really sit up with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I really love this harness. It was a little hard to adjust but I got it adjusted and it fits Eich (German Shepard), 78lb. perfect. It is easy to get on and off. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Clairese Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price! Very well made! Product uses great materials and is very easy to adjust to your pet! Great product to purchase for your animals safety!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted TWO minutes!! Ended up costing us almost $500.
customer_reviews.text: Two minutes! That’s how long it took my dog to chew through this very expensive crap. I put it on her, put my suitcase in the garage and came back to my husband pointing at the broken harness. It cost us 3 days of boarding, since there was no way to ride 5 hours in a car with her unsecured. If you plan on riding alone with your dog in the back, prepare for them to chew though it.
customer_reviews.author: nitzy perez

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: There's bulk to this harness, which might make it uncomfortable for a small dog, but for my large spoo, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: SAFE AND SECURE WHILE ENJOYING THE COUNTRY SIDE
customer_reviews.text: He took a liking to it with the first fitting. he knows how easy it is to go on and off. and we love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: jcv: a great product especially the display

customer_reviews.title: Safe, dog not so fond of it. Use it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: We went on a long road trip with this and my doggo started getting grumpy when it was time to put it on. And he wasn’t super comfortable on the longer rides. On the other hand, he’s my boy and I must protect him and this harness has passed the that few others have.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Dog Safety
customer_reviews.text: This dog seat belt harness is amazing. It is strong, supportive, and attractive. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic closure did not stay fastened. Hope they fix this soon.
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic closure does not stay shut and my dog got loose. I'm going to have to return it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Cerreta

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind is priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Well worth the cost and great for peace of mind knowing my sweet dog is now buckled in and secure the same way we buckle in children. The harness is super sturdy and great quality. It reminds me of a bullet proof vest almost. The buckle takes a little getting used to, but it is super easy once you understand how it works. No issues at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Finocchio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product except for the clasp closure for the harness which doesn't always clasp securely. Even with that, I would purchase this product again. I just think it needs a better clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Dog Seat belt harness
customer_reviews.text: My dog was able to get out of it on her own when I opened the door. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dunkman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing set up.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this harness. Follow the video for how to set up the sizing and then it works like a charm. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Van Utt

customer_reviews.title: Well Made but could be easier for Dog to Wear
customer_reviews.text: This fits the dog well but allows him to turn around backwards and get thus become uncomfortable enough to whine until we stop and straighten him out.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the product as is already damaged, we’ve used only one week and strictly for the car and is already tearing apart, and my dog is not a chewer. I do not recommend this product as is not cheap and I have to replace it within one week of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marcela fino

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my small to medium size dog, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my small to medium size dog, bulky but it works. Keeps her in one place in the car. I have a convertible, with the top down I know she is set in place.
customer_reviews.author: alice blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Safety first for my giant schnauzer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have Giant schnauzer and I take her with me all the time. I feel she is safe and secure while we drive.
customer_reviews.author: kimoko

customer_reviews.title: Get this seatbelt!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog seatbelt! With the seatbelt actually going through the harness, my dog is restrained and safe every time we drive together. I feel such a sense of relief using this. My pup didn't give me any issues using this harness. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Andrade

customer_reviews.title: It really is good
customer_reviews.text: So my dog hates it but it's perfect. It gives me peace of mind that my service dog will be safe in the car. If your car is to small for a crate please consider this.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Morelos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and fast to use!You just need to set up in your dog just one time! After that it is super easy to put and take out! And the material is very good! It is expensive BUT it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Santos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Just took our dogs on their first road trip with these harnesses. The dogs were very comfortable, and I felt confident that they were also much safer (as opposed to free-ranging the back seat as we do around town). The harness is easy to setup and use. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Glazewski

customer_reviews.title: Crash tested is what sold me!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad my dog is safe in this. He can lay down or sit up with it buckeled in.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best safety harnesses!! I bought a medium a year ago for my dogs and this year I bought a large for my new pup as he grows. Very easy to use and well made, easy to fit and even easier to put on once you’ve fit it once.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jean Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to adjust as shown.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use this product because it pins the dog to the seat too close and it is uncomfortable for her. Even with the other piece I bought with the swivel it is no better. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Good, but escape artists beware
customer_reviews.text: Has to be tight! Our boxer is a year old and he slips out of it no problem in the car. Other than that, great for both travel and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: 100% worth the money & peace of mind! We travel a lot, & this is my reassurance of safety.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness. It keeps my dog safe and is so easy to use. Hook up and removal are a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Burneell

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind knowing our baby is safe
customer_reviews.text: We love our babe and he loves car rides! Whenever we can we have him come with us. We realized we needed to keep him safe and are so happy we found this product! It took him about two wears until he was used to it but now he gets excited because he knows it means we are going somewhere! Thanks for keeping our pup safe
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Wish the design provided for a way to keep halter from creeping up to our pupp’s throat.
customer_reviews.author: Clif L.

customer_reviews.title: Huskies Can Get Out, or maybe it's the product..... DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Husky gets out of it every single time I've used it. Sits on my shelf, does not work if I can't keep him in the harness. And yes, it is the correct size. Just does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mit Araho

customer_reviews.title: Best dog car harness I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best dog car harness I have ever used, and I've had a few. Yes it's expensive but my wife's big dog is priceless and loves his open top no doors jeep rides. This rig is built solid, adjustable at all four sides, and doubles as a walking harness. Plus it's one of the few that's actually crash tested. $ well spent.
customer_reviews.author: David Ford

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should buy this
customer_reviews.text: This harness is great, it keeps my dog in place in the car. It’s definitely not her favorite thing to wear because it’s kind of stiff but once she’s settled in the car she looks comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failure
customer_reviews.text: Webbing on harness is flimsy. Dog was able to bite through 3/4 of it during a 20 minute test ride.
customer_reviews.author: David Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very well made. My little terror feels totally safe now with my bad driving.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Magnum harness
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed. Would recommend to others. It is not cheeply made. It is magnum protection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dog slips out in moments
customer_reviews.text: We've followed all the instructions, and each time we use this, our GSD slips out of the harness by the time our car is down the driveway. We missed our window for returns, so we're out $124.89.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on dog
customer_reviews.text: simple, easy to put on dog, quality built, stong and heavy duty. gives me a great feeling knowing the dog is much safer riding in the car with this product on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not for me and my chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I need to return to hard to set up uncomfortable for my t cup chihuahua
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy convertible dog!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, medium dog 45pounds. Works great. Bought so dog could ride in my convertible.
customer_reviews.author: Nlaketahoe

customer_reviews.title: Safe protection.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy to put on and my dog seems very comfy in it. I feel like she’s safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: EzyDog Drive Safety Travel Dog Car Harness - Crash Tested US (FMVSS 213) - Premium Vehicle Restraint Vest for Protection and Comfort - Easy One Time Fit and Use with Car Seat Belt (Size)
product_meta.description: Size:LargeFEATURES: Crash tested > Quick, one-time fit > Double D-Rings for leash attachment > Dual SR buckle closure > Ergonomic, molded chest plate. CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Regularly inspect your harness for any signs of damage and excessive wear including: Frayed/cut webbing > Deformed Metal UV/sun damage > Pulled stitches Chew and bite marks > ALWAYS REPLACE HARNESS IF SHOWING SIGNS OF DAMAGE > Hand wash in mild detergent and air dry in shade. Store in a dry place, out of direct sunlight. Now Go and Play! SIZE & FITTING INSTRUCTIONS: For best fit measure the girth of the dog. This is the area behind the front legs and around the body. The neck will typically fall into place once girth is determined. If the measurement is close to the end of the size range, go up to the larger size. Size Girth (cm and in) SMALL 28 - 64 cm 11 - 25 in MEDIUM 38 - 86 cm 15 - 34 in LARGE 49 - 106 cm 19 - 42 in typically fall into place once girth is determined. If the measurement is close to the end of the size range, go up to the larger size. Size Girth (cm and in) S 28 - 64 cm 11 - 25 in M 38 - 86 cm 15 - 34 in L 49 - 106 cm 19 - 42 in
feature_bullets: SAFETY TESTED VEHICLE HARNESS This car safety harness conforms to all relevant requirements for the following standards: USA (FMVSS 213) Europe (ECE Regulation 21) Australia (ADR42/04)
BEST DOG HARNESS FOR CAR TRAVEL Simply feed the seat belt through both webbing handles on the top of the harness, click the buckle into the seat belt of your car and you're ready for the Drive.
SIMPLE, ONE TIME FIT You only have to fit the harness to your dog once. From then on, the Harness can be taken on/off very quickly using the Dual SR buckle closure system.

ENGINEERED TO LAST We have used only the strongest and high quality materials in this product. The Tri-Glides are made from ALUMINUM ALLOY, so they are light, durable and incredibly strong. All webbing is made from vehicle-tested seat belt webbing and the Crosslink Technology ensures that the harness is the ultimate in strength. The Chest Plate section is padded and contoured to mold to the shape of the dog for a custom fit.
SELECT THE BEST SIZE: Fit matters! If you are close to the end of a size, choose the larger of two sizes: GIRTH in inches: SM 11”-25”, MD 15”-34”, LG 19”-42”
